# CapturedRoom.Surface.Category

**Enumeration**

Classifications of a surface in a captured room.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Category
```

## Overview

Each [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface] instance in a captured room’s surface arrays ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/doors], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/openings], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/walls], and [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/windows]) reflects a classification ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface/category-swift.property]) of this type.

## Determining the surface category

- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Category.floor**: A category for a surface that represents a floor.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Category.door(isOpen:)**: A category for a surface that represents a door.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Category.opening**: A category for a surface that represents an opening.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Category.wall**: A category for a surface that represents a wall.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Category.window**: A category for a surface that represents a window.

## Identifying a surface

- **identifier**: A unique alphanumeric value that the framework assigns the surface.
- **parentIdentifier**: A unique alphanumeric value that identifies a surface’s parent surface.
- **category**: A classification that the captured room assigns the surface.
- **confidence**: A level of certainty in the surface’s category.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
